situation: A few players are playing a boardgame. The current state of the game is as follows. The butterfly builds a power plant near the green fields of the gorilla. The chihuahua does not dance with the gorilla. And the rules of the game are as follows. Rule1: If the butterfly builds a power plant close to the green fields of the gorilla and the chihuahua does not dance with the gorilla, then the gorilla will never surrender to the lizard. Rule2: If you are positive that one of the animals does not surrender to the lizard, you can be certain that it will not suspect the truthfulness of the basenji.
question: Based on the game state and the rules and preferences, does the gorilla suspect the truthfulness of the basenji?
label: disproved
